mapper.select: select stockno,stockname from stock where categrpno = #{categrpno} order by stockrdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into contents ( contentsno, categrpno, stockno, title, keyword, deliveryCharge, manager, contents) values( (select nvl(max(contentsno),0)+1 as contentsno from contents ), #{categrpNo}, #{stockNo}, #{title}, #{keyword}, #{deliveryCharge}, #{manager}, #{contents} )
mapper.select: select max(contentsno) as contentsno from contents

SELECT c.categrpname , s.stockname, s.stockprice, s.stockcnt, p.title, p.deliverycharge, p.contentsno, p.contents FROM CATEGROUP C INNER JOIN CONTENTS P ON c.categrpno = P.CATEGRPNO INNER JOIN STOCK S ON p.stockno = s.stockno WHERE p.contentsno = #{contentsno}
